TopicTitle: Stock Small Radial RCS Tank Uses Stack RCS Tank Texture

Articles.Content:
Here's a pic:

I got this after uninstalling Ven's Stock Revamp and restoring my backed-up old Squad folder (Which was only backed up a few hours before I uninstalled the stock revamp). Help please?
Delete the squad folder and run patcher.

Delete the squad folder and run patcher.

I have the steam version.

You can delete the gamedata\squad folder then verify the game cache in the Steam launcher

Properties\Local files\Verify integrity

Delete the squad folder and run patcher.

I left the part revamp MM config in there. I deleted that and deleted and reinstalled the "Squad" folder using that exact method.
